name: SPECTACLE
body:
### What is SPECTACLE
SPECTACLE is ...


### How to Install
You can download the latest release of SPECTACLE [here](https://github.com/thirtyeggs/spectacle/releases).

```
$ tar zxvf spectacle-X.XX.tar.gz
$ cd spectacle-X.XX
$ make
```

### How to Run SPECTACLE
Refer to [SPECTACLE User Guide](http://spectacle.csl.illinois.edu/user/yunheo1/spectacle/doc/SPECTACLE_User_Guide_V0.02.pdf)

### Data Sets
#### 1. Illumina
##### 1.1 S. aureus
#### 2. PacBio
